discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ADE
agree with CineZorro824

Selected Answer: BDE
In Dynamics 365 Field Service, the bookable resource statuses are used to track the progress of a specific work order requirement1. The statuses are updated by field technicians on the Field Service Mobile app1. Out of the box, the booking statuses are: Scheduled, Traveling, In Progress, On Break, Completed, and Canceled1.

Given the options you provided and based on the information from Dynamics 365 Field Service documentation1, the three bookable resource statuses that should be used when a work order status must be automatically changed to the correct stage when resources are booked are:

Scheduled
Traveling
On Break

The question is about bookable resource statuses, so the answer shouldn't be Work Order statuses (like Unscheduled).
I think Scheduled, Traveling, and On Break are the correct answers. Those are the only default Booking Resource Statuses in the list of answers.
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/field-service/work-order-status-booking-status

questions.question_text:
A company uses Dynamics 365 Field Service. The company sends employees to customer sites for repairs. Work orders are created for repairs. No customizations have been made.

A work order status must be automatically changed to the correct stage with resources are booked.

Which three bookable resource statuses should you use?

Each correct answer presents a complete solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

comments.content:
Yes No No

Changes made in Excel Online do not automatically sync with Dynamics 365 unless the data is explicitly re-imported or integrated through other means.

discussion.content: microsoft excel templates do not contain all the rows and only have a sample of row and we could not use these templates to update Rows, so the first one is No

comments.content: I dont think you can update row information using templates, can you? My understanding is that Excel templates are used for exporting data from D365 into excel for sharing internally.

questions.question_text:
A company uses Dynamics 365 Sales and Dynamics 365 Customer Service.

The management team wants to understand the benefits of the Dynamics 365 App for Outlook.

You need to explain the available features.

Which two features should you explain?

Each correct answer presents a complete solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.D: Synchronize a custom field in the contact table to a user-defined field in Outlook.
choices.A: Track an email from Outlook to an existing sales order in Dynamics 365 Sales.
choices.C: Synchronize an appointment created in Dynamics 365 Sales to Outlook.
